strings.Value: "Miss me?" {n}Whistling to herself, Linzi enters the throne room. The bard is thinner than you recall. She seems to have acquired a few scars, and her clothes look no better than rags. Nevertheless, she seems as cheerful as ever, and her smile as carefree.{/n}

"Well, I had quite an adventure in {g|Numeria}Numeria{/g}! Enough material to fill a whole separate book, and then some! All those barbarians, metallic monsters, {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g} agents... How I managed to make it out, only {g|Shelyn}Shelyn{/g} knows!"

"So, how've things been here without me? Seems you've become a baron{mf||ess}! You'll have to tell me later how you managed to defeat the Stag Lord, and all the rest of your adventures. I'm starving for details! My book isn't going to write itself, you know!"
